document_data.name: Tower of Pain Exalted
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Pain Exalted''' was found in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1358 DR]]. This temple was dedicated to the worship of [[Loviatar]], the Maiden of Pain.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Ulamyth Quantor]] served as the High Priest, or High Torturelord, of the temple. He and his 14 fellow priests preached the word of Loviatar to a congregation of 26 believers.
document_data.History: The temple was founded in the {{YearlinkName|1245}} during a time when Zhentil Keep was more welcoming to some of the oppressed religions of the south.
